### 2. Code Improvements

**Source:** `~/Projects/work-prod` implementation (Phase 1-3)  
**Status:** ðŸŸ¡ Pending Application  
**Priority:** HIGH  
**Total Effort:** ~26 hours

**Key Learnings:**
- Testing strategy should be decided in Week 1 research
- Flask application factory pattern needs complete template
- Security review (Sourcery) should be mandatory from day 1
- Archive patterns can be simpler than expected (status-based)
- CLI confirmation prompts prevent accidents
- Post-PR automation reduces manual work

**See:** [Code Improvements](code-improvements.md) for full details

---

## ðŸ”„ Review Process

**After Each Work-Prod Phase:**
- Capture learnings while fresh
- Document patterns that worked well
- Note improvements needed in templates

**Quarterly Review:**
- Prioritize opportunities by impact
- Estimate effort for template updates
- Plan implementation schedule

**Before Template Updates:**
- Consolidate related opportunities
- Create implementation plan
- Test updated templates
